mapper.select: select id, api_id, base_url, api_key, completions_path, embeddings_path, status, create_time, update_time from ai_client_api where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ai_client_api(api_id, base_url, api_key, completions_path, embeddings_path, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{apiId}, #{baseUrl}, #{apiKey}, #{completionsPath}, #{embeddingsPath}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})

insert into ai_client_api(api_id, base_url, api_key, completions_path, embeddings_path, status, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.apiId}, #{entity.baseUrl}, #{entity.apiKey}, #{entity.completionsPath}, #{entity.embeddingsPath}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into ai_client_api(api_id, base_url, api_key, completions_path, embeddings_path, status, create_time, update_time) values
(#{entity.apiId}, #{entity.baseUrl}, #{entity.apiKey}, #{entity.completionsPath}, #{entity.embeddingsPath}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update api_id = values(api_id), base_url = values(base_url), api_key = values(api_key), completions_path = values(completions_path), embeddings_path = values(embeddings_path), status = values(status), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update ai_client_api
api_id = #{apiId},
base_url = #{baseUrl},
api_key = #{apiKey},
completions_path = #{completionsPath},
embeddings_path = #{embeddingsPath},
status = #{status},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
